item.title: Hardware-enabled DDOS Protection
item.description: It is crucial to also protect a switch’s control plane to ensure the proper control plane applications have access to the switch’s CPU. Failure to do so could increase vulnerabilities to a Denial of Service (DOS) attack. Cumulus Linux provides control plane protection by default. It also offers a DDOS protection mechanism, which protects data plane, control plane and management plane traffic in the switch.
